title: Audrina Patridge of The Hills
description:
Audrina Patridge, OG star of The Hills, shares stories from the set of the reality series, and talks about what it was like to date on camera, her relationship with Justin Bobby Brescia, and her decision to return to The Hills reboot in 2019. She also touches on toxic relationships, raising her 6-year-old daughter, Kirra, the joys of motherhood, dating now, and what it took to pen her new memoir, “Choices: To The Hills And Back Again,” which is available now.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Lala Kent | Cumulus Podcast Network
